Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Westbound Reroute near Foster/Leclaire
ShortDescription: WB 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Montrose, Milwaukee and into Jefferson Park: due to, street blockage near Foster/Leclaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Montrose, Milwaukee and into Jefferson Park: due to, street blockage near Foster/Leclaire.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
